00024 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Listing extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractView {
00025 
00033         public function render($gp,$errors) {
00034 
00035                 $this->gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00036 
00037                 //set template
00038                 $this->template = $this->subparts['template'];
00039 
00040                 //read settings
00041                 $settings = $this->configuration->getSettings();
00042                 if(!$settings['fe_listing.']) {
00043                         throw new Exception("No config found!");
00044                 }
00045                 $settings = $settings['fe_listing.'];
00046                 $this->settings = $settings;
00047 
00048                 $subpart = $this->subparts['item'];
00049 
00050                 $this->getMapping();
00051                 $markers = array();
00052                 foreach($this->model as $key=>$row) {
00053                                 
00054                         $markers = $this->getValueMarkers($row);
00055                         $this->fillDefaultMarkers($markers,$row);
00056                         $markerArray['###LIST###'] .= $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($subpart,$markers);
00057                 }
00058                 $content = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template,$markerArray);
00059                 if($this->gp['detailId']) {
00060                         $markerArray = $markers;
00061                         $this->fillDefaultMarkers($markerArray);
00062                         $content = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($content,$markerArray);
00063                 }
00064 
00065                 //remove markers that were not substituted
00066                 $content = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::removeUnfilledMarkers($content);
00067                 return $this->pi_wrapInBaseClass($content);
00068         }
00069 
00080         protected function fillDefaultMarkers(&$markers,&$row = array()) {
00081                 if($row['uid']) {
00082                         $markers["###LINK2SHOW###"] = $this->cObj->getTypolink("Detail",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,array("mailformplusplus" => array("detailId"=>$row['uid'])));
00083                         if($this->settings['enableDelete'] == 1) {
00084                                 $markers['###DELETE###'] = $this->cObj->getTypolink("X",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,array("mailformplusplus" => array("deleteId"=>$row['uid'])));
00085                         }
00086                 } elseif($this->settings['enableDelete'] == 1) {
00087                         $markers['###DELETE###'] = $this->cObj->getTypolink("X",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,array("mailformplusplus" => array("deleteId"=>$this->gp['detailId'])));
00088                 }
00089                         
00090 
00091                 $markers["###BACK_LINK###"] = $this->cObj->getTypolink("Back",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id);
00092         }
00093 
00099         protected function getMapping() {
00100                 if(!is_array($this->settings['mapping.'])) {
00101                         return array();
00102                 }
00103 
00104                 $mapping = array();
00105                 foreach($this->settings['mapping.'] as $dbfield=>$formfield) {
00106                         $mapping[$dbfield] = $formfield;
00107                 }
00108                 $this->mapping = $mapping;
00109         }
00110 
00117         protected function getValueMarkers(&$row) {
00118                 $markers = array();
00119                 foreach($row as $field=>$value) {
00120                         if(strcmp("uid",$field)) {
00121                                 $mapping = $this->mapping[$field];
00122                                 $markers['###value_'.$mapping.'###'] = $value;
00123                         }
00124                 }
00125                 return $markers;
00126         }
00127 
00128 }
